text:
Shots Studios is an MCN on YouTube managing and promoting some of the greatest Talent on the Net. We're currently looking for US citizens or residents data scientist and data visualizers to YT-optimize. Currently we have grown 400% in YT-watchtime in a few months and we look to grow even more!

To apply you must be eligible to work in USA, live in the BayArea and have previous experience in data science.

Please contact dathan @ shots.com
